string-array.name: card_silent_desc
string-array.item: Deal 7 damage. If the enemy is Poisoned, deal 7 damage again.
Gain 6 Block. Add 1 Shiv to your hand.
Deal 4 damage to ALL enemies twice.
Deal 9 damage. Draw 1 card. Discard 1 card.
Gain 4 Block. Next turn gain 4 Block.
Deal 8 damage. Next turn gain 1 Energy.
ALL enemies lose 6 Strength for 1 turn. Exhaust.
Deal 10 damage. If you have discarded a card this turn, gain 2 Energy.
Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies. Discard 1 card at random.
Gain 5 Block. Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.
Apply 3 poison to a random enemy 3 times.
Discard your hand, then draw that many cards.\n Exhaust.
Whenever you are attacked, deal 3 damage to the attacker.
Deal 12 damage. Whenever you play a card this turn, targeted enemy loses 3 HP.
Apply 4 Poison and 2 Weak to ALL enemies. Exhaust.
Add a random Skill to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.
Whenever you draw this card, add a copy of it to your hand. Deal 4 damage. Exhaust.
Draw 1 card. If the card is a Skill, gain 3 Block.
Costs 1 less Energy for each card discarded this turn. Deal 6 damage three times.
Draw cards until you have 6 in your hand.
Deal 6 damage for each Attack played this turn.
Deal 4 damage for each Skill in your hand.
Deal 5 damage. If the enemy is Weak, Gain 1 Energy and draw 1 card.
At the start of your turn, add a Shiv to your hand.
Costs 1 additional Energy for each time you lose HP this combat. Deal 12 damage.
At the start of your turn, apply 2 Poison to ALL enemies.
Deal 15 damage. Draw 2 more cards next turn.
Unplayable. If this card is discarded from your hand, draw 1 card.
Place a card in your hand on top of your draw pile. It costs 0 until it is played.
Unplayable. If this card is discarded from your hand, gain 1 Energy.
At the end of your turn, Retain up to 1 card.
Whenever you play a card, deal 1 damage to ALL enemies.
Whenever you play a card, gain 1 Block.
You cannot draw additional cards this turn. Reduce the cost of cards in your hand to 0 this turn.
This turn your next 1 Skill is played twice.
Apply 6 Poison. When the enemy dies, deal damage equal to its max HP to ALL enemies.
Deal 13 damage to ALL enemies.\n Exhaust.
Next turn, draw X cards and gain X Energy.
Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply 1 Poison.
Deal 8 damage twice. Glass Knife\'s damage is lowered by 2 this combat.
Can only be played if there are no cards in your draw pile. Deal 50 damage to ALL enemies.
Enemy loses X Strength. Apply X Weak. Exhaust.
Choose a card.\n Next turn, add 3 copies of that card into your hand.\n Exhaust.
On your next turn, your Attack damage is doubled.
Discard your hand. Add 1 Shiv to your hand for each card discarded.
At the start of your turn, draw 1 card and discard 1 card.
Deal 14 damage. Discard all non-Attack cards.
Gain 2 Intangible. At the end of your turn, lose 1 Dexterity.
